pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Analysis of Seemingly Unrelated Regression Models // Implementation of the direct Monte Carlo approach of Zellner and Ando (2010) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2010.04.005 to sample from posterior of Seemingly Unrelated Regression (SUR) models. In addition, a Gibbs sampler is implemented that allows the user to analyze SUR models using the power prior.
